google_google_folder_iam_binding.description: Allows management of a single binding with an IAM policy for a Google Cloud Platform folder.

folder.description: The resource name of the folder the policy is attached to. Its format is folders/{folder_id}.

members.description: - An array of identities that will be granted the privilege in the `role`.

role.description: The role that should be applied. Only one

etag.description: (Computed) The etag of the folder's IAM policy.
